post.summary: Find the system for the user
Provides an access_token for the user

post.description: Provides an access_token for a authorization_code
Changes the user's password to a new password

patch.description: Make changes to a location. Any blank parameter deletes an old value, any unspecified parameter does nothing

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id for the location you want to update

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Filter categories by a search query

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Show categories in the specified language. One of de, en, es, fr

description.description: A description for the photo - max 255 chars

messages.description: All messages in the conversation including the assistant response
All messages in the conversation including the assistant response

parameters.name: datapointId
parameters.description: Data point ID you want to reply to

reply.description: The text you want to reply

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: The types of metrics you want to get

dayOfWeek.description: The weekday (1 - Monday, 2 - Tuesday, 3 - Wednesday, 4 - Thursday, 5 - Friday, 6 - Saturday, 7 - Sunday)

intervals.description: A list of openinghours (time intervals), only required when `closed` is `false`

date.description: The date of a special opening hour (format: yyyy-MM-dd)

intervals.description: A list of hour ranges (time intervals), only required when `closed` is `false`

id.description: A unique id for the photo

description.description: A description for the photo - max 255 chars

id.description: The unique id of the data point

liked.description: Whether this datapoint has been liked or not

data.description: Content of the datapoint (text of the review, url of the photo, count of checkins...)

type.description: Datapoint Type. Values: [PHOTO, REVIEW, CHECKIN, CONVERSATION, QUESTION]

countLikes.description: Number of likes to this item

actionDate.description: The date when the review/photo/... was published in the online directory

countComments.description: Number of comments to this item.

dateCreated.description: The date the datapoint was found

directLink.description: A link to the online profile

flagged.description: Whether the datapoint has been flagged. The exact nature of the flagging depends on the directory, but can be e.g. "Report as SPAM"

rating.description: Rating given by the user. Float value, max: 5.

repliedByOwner.description: True if the owner of the business has replied

secondaryData.description: Additional info about the datapoint (eg. text content on instagram pictures)

threadActionDate.description: The date of the last interaction in that thread. When a review receives a new comment, the parent will update.
